startUrls.title: Target URLs
startUrls.description: List of websites to scan. The scanner will crawl these URLs and analyze all JavaScript files found.

maxDepth.title: Crawl Depth
maxDepth.description: Maximum depth for crawling links (1 = only start URL, 2 = start URL + 1 level of links, etc.)

includeCdn.title: Scan CDN Files
includeCdn.description: Include JavaScript files hosted on CDNs (unpkg, cdnjs, jsdelivr, etc.). Warning: This will scan third-party libraries.

filterCommonLibraries.title: Filter Common Libraries
filterCommonLibraries.description: Skip scanning common JavaScript libraries like jQuery, Bootstrap, React, etc. Recommended: true

minConfidence.title: Minimum Confidence Level
minConfidence.description: Only report findings with this confidence level or higher. HIGH = fewer false positives.
enumTitles: Low - More results, may include false positives
